RT @trekonomics And while some Republican compares @AOC to the Khmer Rouge in an obscene attack ad, the Trump administration is deporting Cambodians who *fled the Khmer Rouge* when they were children.
https://foreignpolicy.com/2019/08/14/deported-to-their-parents-homeland-cambodian-americans-start-anew/

Great op-ed by @ChristiCraddick on the destructive anti-energy policies Dems are embracing.

"Dems cont to show their disdain for fossil fuels w anti-energy policies that would regulate workers out of jobs & cost consumers more for the energy that powers their homes and vehicles" https://twitter.com/ChronOpinion/status/1172171669084999681 QT @ChronOpinion Democrats continue to show their disdain for fossil fuels with anti-energy policies that would hurt workers and consumers, writes @ChristiCraddick  https://www.houstonchronicle.com/opinion/outlook/article/Craddick-2020-Democrats-policies-would-14432495.php

Yet again another Texas law enforcement officer injured in the line of duty. Violence against our law enforcement is unacceptable and must be stopped. Please join me in lifting up in prayers the @HPOUTX @houstonpolice officer who was injured & wishing him a swift recovery. https://twitter.com/NickABC13/status/1172477154061369347 QT @NickABC13 HPD OFFICER SHOT: A @houstonpolice officer was shot overnight in a violent south side crime spree. Chief @ArtAcevedo is going to update @abc13houston on the officer’s condition at 9:00 a.m. https://abc13.com/officer-shot-and-suspect-killed-in-houstons-south-side/5536540/

GOP’s message: No policy, no facts, just displays of violence + corporations like @ABCNetwork & Sinclair who amplify them.

They profit from burning my likeness on TV. But who pays for heightened security? Who answers the phones for the threats resulting from a violent, false ad? https://twitter.com/rashidatlaib/status/1172457376471015424 QT @RashidaTlaib Exactly my thoughts. The mere act of burning her image is a display of violence. Folks need to stick to facts & policy positions. They need to stop fear mongering & more importantly demonizing members of Congress. FYI: No one puts her residents (and our planet) first, like @AOC https://twitter.com/yashar/status/1172342790963060737

I know how important having a teacher who looks like you is to your success. #DemDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEUPr-NWkAABJNK.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1172359821082923008/vid/480x270/EtsYI18_wBEaLBTD.mp4?tag=13

Giant corporations don’t get to ruin the water for everyone else because it increases their profitability. When I’m president, I’ll reinstate the clean water rule to protect our streams and wetlands—and the drinking water they provide. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/12/climate/trump-administration-rolls-back-clean-water-protections.html

Saddened to hear of the passing of civil rights activist & leader, Juanita Abernathy, who led the movement—from marching on Washington, boycotting in Montgomery, walking in Selma. Her spirit will live on through her tremendous contributions. My thoughts are with her loved ones. https://twitter.com/APSouthRegion/status/1172309409734619142 QT @APSouthRegion Juanita Abernathy, a civil rights advocate and the widow of the Rev. Dr. Ralph Abernathy, has died in Atlanta after complications from a stroke. She was 88. https://apnews.com/a9766517463e4932a8d5d34e4b26d40e?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=APSouthRegion&utm_campaign=SocialFlow

RT @belensisaw As latinos, we cannot afford to stay home this election. We have too much to lose! Join me this Sunday at 8pm for a special Unidos Con Bernie: Plan to Win webinar to find out the most important things we can be doing as Latinos to win big for Bernie. https://bsanders.us/unidos-web-15 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEYL2gVWkAA8fRp.jpg

Right now, Congress is held hostage by a small group of well-financed gun lobbyists. I will break the NRA’s stranglehold on Congress and sign comprehensive gun violence prevention legislation within my first 100 days. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEWlnEhXoAEH0k-.jpg

Congress should pass @SenMarkey & @RepLoriTrahan’s  Leonel Rondon Pipeline Safety Act to prevent disasters like the @ColumbiaGasMA explosions. And we should pass my Accountable Capitalism Act to force companies like @NiSource to pay attention to workers’ & communities' interests.

That's why I'm fighting for #MedicareForAll. So that people like @AdyBarkan get the care they need. So that Rachael doesn't have to spend hours on hold, filling out forms, and fighting to get Ady's care covered. And Ady can enjoy the time he has left with his family.

Here’s a list of all the people I’ve met who love their health insurance premiums:

There aren’t any.

The system is working great for giant pharmaceutical companies, but not so great for everyone who needs prescription drugs. I've got a few plans to fix that. https://twitter.com/AARPadvocates/status/1172193254676271110 QT @AARPadvocates In AARP's exclusive interview series with presidential candidates, @ewarren told us how she will lower drug prices. We're hoping to hear more during tonight's #DemDebate. 

It's time to #StopRxGreed! http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1172193030541119489/img/rO9iDOcRvrfec2n_.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1172193030541119489/vid/320x320/ihlCamY3vWp75LN4.mp4?tag=13

I simply don't believe in having a health care system where insurance and pharmaceutical corporations make billions in profits while thousands die because they can't afford care.

This is a big deal: @NYCSchools is standing in solidarity with the global #ClimateStrike next Friday by excusing absences w/ parental consent.

Thank you, NYC Public Schools! 🏫🌎

Come make friends, join the strike, & sign up to march w/ Team AOC on 9/20: https://secure.ngpvan.com/178PpczHMU-ZdB10Z3-iYQ2 https://twitter.com/nycschools/status/1172191885928095744 QT @NYCSchools .@NYCschools will excuse absences of students participating in the #ClimateStrike on Friday 9/20. Students will need parental consent. Younger students can only leave school with a parent. https://twitter.com/NYCMayor/status/1172186872560410636

Now or later, our voices will be heard.

Keep me safe, O God;in you I take refuge. I say to the LORD,
you are my Lord, you are my only good.

Psalms 16:1-2

One year ago, the @ColumbiaGasMA explosions destroyed Merrimack Valley homes & businesses & tragically killed a young man. Mayor @danrivera01843 & I wrote to the @EagleTrib about what must be done to prevent a disaster like this from ever happening again. https://www.eagletribune.com/opinion/column-safety-standards-accountability-must-enforced-after-gas-disaster/article_93301730-86ad-5aed-b36f-0898754f574a.html

RT @Independent Ignore everyone else. Cory Booker won the debate - and just proved he's the one to watch for president https://www.independent.co.uk/voices/democratic-debate-who-won-cory-booker-texas-beto-orourke-polls-a9104251.html
I know what’s broken in our country, and I’m in this fight to fix it.

Our nation and this team is made better because of you. I could not be more proud of you, @lilmsg14. Congratulations! 
https://twitter.com/lilmsg14/status/1172223883937800197 QT @lilmsg14 Today, I‘m reminded of the beauty of this great nation. A nation that has opened her arms in times of need and uplifted my each & every triumph, small as can be. A nation that has taught me to dream of the impossible & just believe.

Today, I‘m honored to become a U.S. Citizen 🇺🇸 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EESTaGjWwAAaE4W.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EESTaGnXkAENPDd.jpg

Wall Street billionaires have cooked up a new scheme: buying up health clinics so they can charge unsuspecting patients insane “out-of-network” fees. That is pretty disgusting. https://cepr.shorthandstories.com/private-equity-surprise-billing/index.html

I stand with the educators and support staff of @CTULocal1 and @SEIU73 in their fight for the schools Chicago's students deserve. It's unconscionable for wealthy corporations to receive massive tax breaks while children go without school nurses and librarians. https://twitter.com/SEIU73/status/1169958773554896897 QT @SEIU73 “When we fight side by side, when we fight together, when we stand for something that’s right...that is how we win!” @CTULocal1 President Jesse Sharkey on the picket line in solidarity with Local 73. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1169958388136062983/pu/img/eUeoFojj3owAOyyq.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1169958388136062983/pu/vid/480x270/Z2EaJfdRl90DSwYa.mp4?tag=10

RT @AdamSchiff Last time the GOP was in charge, it passed a massive tax cut for the richest Americans. @gopleader said it would pay for itself - yet our debt soared.

Now, they want to use the debt they created to cut Social Security and Medicare.

Thank goodness they won’t get the chance. https://twitter.com/elwasson/status/1172235943094493185 QT @elwasson Asked @GOPLeader what his top priority would be if he is Speaker in 2021. "The first thing we would do is make sure our debt is taken care of."

Keep fighting, @DebButlerHD18. Democracy depends on all of us being willing to speak out. #WeWillNotYield https://twitter.com/nowthisnews/status/1172163707679326208 QT @nowthisnews Republicans in North Carolina used a 9/11 memorial to trick Democrats into missing a key vote http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEM9DBnXUAA3vjD.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1171846785750507520/vid/320x320/bXpnCFYqAL-oA5dG.mp4?tag=13

My friend @AdyBarkan has "good" health insurance, but it's not nearly enough. Every month, he has thousands of dollars in medical bills that his insurer won't cover. His wife Rachael spends hours every week arguing with their insurer. That's time she can't spend with Ady. https://twitter.com/AdyBarkan/status/1171402259437162497 QT @AdyBarkan To fix our health care system, we need a smart, equitable plan. But we also need a plan that centers the tragedies far too many of us face. 

Today, @ewarren shares her vision for health care — and her story.  http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEDYyqwXUAIO-Rs.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1171171443792580614/vid/480x270/9nkw42mk4vWKOaqq.mp4?tag=13

RT @timeforkids TFK Kid Reporter Eshaan Mani attended the #DemDebate last night! Good reporters never miss an opportunity to ask a question. Eshaan asked candidate Kamala Harris: “What is your advice for the youth of today?” http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1172506748571267074/pu/img/69PIhPO9ZLMfjZfd.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1172506748571267074/pu/vid/320x568/IeFsox01YdH1r2yK.mp4?tag=10

The Republicans who are suppressing the vote are terrified of how we could transform this country when millions more Americans are allowed to participate in our democracy. They are cowards. https://twitter.com/ariberman/status/1171478361610174470 QT @AriBerman 1,688 polling places closed since 2012 in states previously subject to Voting Rights Act:

-750 in Texas

-320 in Arizona

-214 in Georgia

-126 in Louisiana

-96 in Mississippi

-72 in Alabama

https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2019/09/report-more-than-1600-polling-places-have-closed-since-the-supreme-court-gutted-the-voting-rights-act/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEHtW1oUcAEVNaA.jpg

RT @DevinNunes Socialism primer https://twitter.com/prageru/status/1172578546658594816 QT @prageru Under socialist dictators Hugo Chavez and Nicolas Maduro, Venezuelan adults lost an average of 19 pounds.

Why?

Food and resources are scarce, and poverty is rampant.

Yet in the 1970s, Venezuela was the richest country in Latin America!

Socialism has destroyed #Venezuela. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/902270897662205952/pu/img/2r_dpavxraKC5AcW.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/902270897662205952/pu/vid/240x240/UDGBvEfg9wCoXdA0.mp4

Here's the business model: 

• Flood the country with painkillers
• Lie about the addictive effects
• Start opioid epidemic 
• Cut a deal, admit no wrongdoing
• Hide money in Swiss bank accounts

The billionaire Sackler family must be held criminally liable for their greed. https://twitter.com/AP/status/1172612814210568200 QT @AP BREAKING: Court filings: Family behind OxyContin used Swiss bank accounts to conceal transfer of millions of dollars to themselves.

This is appalling. We must use every tool at our disposal to end the HIV epidemic. That means funding research, reducing transmission rates, and ensuring that those living with HIV get the care that they need. https://www.hivplusmag.com/news/2019/9/09/elizabeth-warren-explains-her-policy-ideas-around-hiv https://twitter.com/FlaDems/status/1171790167734140928 QT @FlaDems While he was governor, @ScottforFlorida blocked $70M in federal funds available for fighting the state's HIV crisis. This is absolutely cruel. https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2019/sep/11/florida-hiv-rick-scott-republican-governor

Your ability to get health care should not be dependent on the whims of your employer. It should be guaranteed under Medicare for All. https://twitter.com/Kate_H_Taylor/status/1172247401568120832 QT @Kate_H_Taylor Scoop from @hcpeterson: Whole Foods is cutting medical benefits for hundreds of part-time workers
https://www.businessinsider.com/whole-foods-cuts-medical-benefits-for-part-time-workers-2019-9 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EESozFcWkAo5Oz3.png

It’s time we had a president who puts people ahead of polluters.

Someone who has held companies accountable, instead of handing them billions in corporate handouts. 

Someone who listens to scientists, not spews science fiction.

Since the GOP will only get worse in their hysteria, let’s remember who we are:

We are fighting to guarantee healthcare in America.
To make education and housing dignified and accessible.
To save our planet.
To set living wages.
To establish justice at home, & peace abroad.

/1

Urban Dictionary—gaffe:
A gaffe is “when a politician accidentally tells the truth.”  Yesterday, Beto accidentally admits, YES, the whole point is that the Dems want to—forcibly—take your guns. https://twitter.com/trscoop/status/1172692288448933889 QT @trscoop LOL! Democrat says Beto has SCREWED the party for YEARS!! https://wp.me/pqwpd-1fOC http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEY9a-FWkAAB1oE.jpg

And guess what: if you also believe in a free + open democratic society, where people are treated humanely  and don’t die over $300 insulin or needless war, they’ll call you a communist too.

Well, they don’t scare us or shake our focus.

We are going to build a better world.

“Comparison of the Dem’s ideology to that of the genocidal Cambodian regime is strongly ahistorical. Solitary confinement is unconstitutional and a form of torture. It must be abolished.

Some in Washington say I am too angry about our broken health care system. I hear stories like this every day in America. My question is: why aren't they angry about it? https://twitter.com/carakorte/status/1172646489186635776 QT @CaraKorte Dramatic moment here at @BernieSanders rally. I’m proud of our Boston & Springfield students for standing up to the gun lobby to end gun violence. Our students are leading the fight to keep our schools & streets safe, & our government must follow their lead. https://twitter.com/pvpspringfield/status/1168846462807158784 QT @pvpspringfield We’re taking our fight straight to Smith and Wesson on September 13th. It is disappointing to see many pundits obsessing over whether one candidate was deferential enough to another, while this crucial moment is barely being discussed.

“Civility” is too often used as a dog whistle for tone policing, while concerning moments like these get a pass. https://twitter.com/nhannahjones/status/1172463112991252480 QT @nhannahjones Here’s the reveal: He talked about poverty, social workers needing to help families raise their kids and debunked science on vocab deficits. He assumed we’d all understand he meant black folks even without saying — as if black is synonymous with poverty/dysfunction. https://twitter.com/anandwrites/status/1172349435071881216
